text: (For other people with the same name, see Andrew Cunningham (disambiguation).) Andrew 'Andy' Cunningham (8 June 1910 â€“ 14 June 2010) was a political figure and union leader in North East England. Born in Durham, he was jailed for his role in the Poulson scandal of 1974. He lived most of his life in Chester-le-Street. At the height of his career in 1971 he held the following positions:
